title: How to stop hackers from controlling my screen - Quora

response.answer_text: Please give a description of the exact scenario ? It could be a parental control software used by hackers to control it and in that case antivirus or antimalwares won't help. If it's a RAT or remote access Trojan most probably antivirus world detect it ( if it's self made and has come recently in market and encrypted well it may not get detected).

Install an Antivirus and an Anti-Malware, MalwareFox is recommended for this. But then again, it seems weird that someone would want to remotely control your PC in this way. Anyway, try it out and tell me if it worked.
